name: Mini Star Survivor
description:
Survive and escape.

Collect stars and use them wisely to become stronger.
Use each character's personality to establish a growth strategy.
And survive and escape for 5 or 10 days.

  • Time taken per round (30 minutes to 2 hours)
  • Very simple game controls (and auto attacks)
  • 32+ playable characters
  • 7 difficulty levels
  • 24 stats
  • 8 useful items
  • 4 weapons
